description:
cmd/cgo: doc updates
1. note that to use C.free <stdlib.h> must be included
2. can also extract errno from a void C function

messages.text:

https://code.google.com/p/go/

cmd/cgo: doc updates
1. note that to use C.free <stdlib.h> must be included
2. can also extract errno from a void C function
